Use: Believe it or not, is a cleaning product that is used to clean the teeth and the mouth. It can also be used to clean the body by applying it to the skin and rubbing it in. It is not recommended for everyday use, but it could be used as a last resort to clean the body.

Use Baking Soda: Baking soda is a natural deodorizer and can be used to clean the body. It is also effective in removing stains and odors. To use it, mix equal parts of baking soda and water and apply it to the skin.
